opensource.name: Programming Language
opensource.description: C#, Python, Typescript, Javascript, HTML, CSS, SASS

opensource.name: Frameworks & Tools
opensource.description: ASP.Net, Django, NextJS, NodeJS, React, Angular, Vue, Svelte

sites.title: Music Traveler
sites.subtitle: Online Booking System for Musical Spaces
sites.description: Music Traveler is a platform designed for musicians, bands, and organizers to discover, book, and manage spaces like rehearsal rooms, recording studios, and performance venues with ease and efficiency.

sites.title: Bemusic
sites.subtitle: Music Sharing and Streaming Platform
sites.description: BeMusic enables users to upload, share, and stream music while engaging with others through comments, likes, and reposts. It supports profile creation, automated waveforms, and curated music channels.

sites.title: Digicollect
sites.subtitle: Business Management Platform
sites.description: Digicollect provides digital tools and insights to help companies streamline operations, adapt to technological changes, and grow at various stages using intelligent business management solutions.

sites.title: Distiller
sites.subtitle: Advisory Platform for Distilleries
sites.description: Distiller connects businesses in the spirits industry with experts for advisory services on recipe creation, equipment selection, quality control, and production process optimization.

sites.title: Geolava
sites.subtitle: AI-driven Real Estate Management Platform
sites.description: Geolava is an AI-powered platform for managing real estate sales, rentals, and leases. It supports listings, tenant communications, rent tracking, and smart property insights for better decisions.

sites.title: Lamps
sites.subtitle: Logistics and Manufacturing Planning System
sites.description: Lamps is an enterprise tool for managing logistics and manufacturing. It helps optimize material flow, production schedules, procurement, transportation, and warehousing operations.

sites.title: Snag Solutions
sites.subtitle: Digital Asset Trading and Minting Platform
sites.description: Snag Solutions is a customizable Web3 platform that supports trading, minting, and managing NFTs and digital assets with built-in social, loyalty, and marketplace features.

sites.title: Roads
sites.subtitle: Route Optimization and Dispatching System
sites.description: Roads helps logistics companies improve delivery performance by using machine learning and real-time data to plan optimal routes and enhance resource allocation.

sites.title: Apecoin Marketplace
sites.subtitle: NFT Marketplace for Digital Creators
sites.description: Apecoin Marketplace allows creators and collectors to mint, buy, and trade NFTs with seamless integration into the OpenSea ecosystem and a secure, user-friendly interface.
